title: Dmytro Rykhlyk
subTitle: I create beautiful interfaces through design & code.
smallBio: A Front-End Web Developer based in Ukraine specializing in building (and occasionally designing) websites and applications for the web. I deeply care about good user experience, beautiful layouts with simplicity and minimalism, and programming fast, reusable, well-tested, and easy-to-maintain code.
contactMessage: Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
